name: Sanctuary VR (Also contains non-VR version)
description: "Sanctuary VR" is a first-person puzzle solving and exploration game designed for Oculus Rift, it has a strong narrative that is fully voice acted. The game is a seated VR experience played with a controller.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 or above Processor: Core i5 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or above DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Oculus Rift support only -  (Vive Support planned)
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
